detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit containing some cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.

Sports bra in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a racer back. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top in a slightly longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif on the front.

Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and fake flap front pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a straight cut hem with slits in the sides.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with decorative lace trims at the top, around the armholes and at the waist. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Straight-cut satin dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a sewn-on bow and slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Round-necked jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Coat in a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar, wind flap with press-studs at the top and a concealed zip. Long raglan sleeves and discreet side pockets. Lined.
Cropped top in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with wide shoulder straps and a frill at the hem.
Cold shoulder blouse in an airy weave with tie-top shoulder straps, a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a scalloped lace trim at the hem. Jersey lining.
Fitted top in stretch, glossy jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a double layer at the top.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short dress in a patterned weave with lace details, a V-neck and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back. Lined.
Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in softly draping denim with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fully lined swimsuits with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. One pair with a rubber print.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, straight-cut dress in a sturdy weave with a sheen, with 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Sleeveless dress in airy cotton seersucker with elastication at the top, narrow, double shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
V-neck body in velour with narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a fine, airy knit containing glittery threads with a round neck, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Scarf in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets with a concealed zip. Long sleeves with contrasting colour panels and elasticated cuffs, and elastication at the hem. Jersey lining.
5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded, lined hood, high collar, zip down the front and side pockets . Lined.
V-neck top in viscose jersey with short, wide sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.

Jeggings in superstretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets. Some of the cotton content of the jeggings is recycled. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Jumper in a soft wool knit containing some cashmere with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Ballet pumps in suede with a scalloped top edge and a decorative bow at the front. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Gently fitted, sleeveless jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar and a concealed press-stud at the front. Tie belt at the waist, welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Short dress in an airy, textured weave with a glittery print, gathers at the top,draping at the front and a yoke at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, narrow elastication and draped details around the waist and a gathered, bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist with wide elastication. Wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
V-neck top in woven fabric with wide draped sleeves with a jersey lining.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy weave with buttons at the back and narrow shoulder straps with decorative buttons at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered, 3/4-length legs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

V-neck playsuit in airy chiffon with a V-neck and decorative ties at the top and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a slit and covered button at the cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Short legs. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with smocking and a V-shaped opening with ties at the neckline. Short, wide raglan sleeves, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Faux fur mules with insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket, flap chest pockets and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and wide, ankle-length legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Pull-on trousers in airy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Cardigan in a soft, fine rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a tie at the hem.
A-line dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a detachable belt in braided imitation suede. Long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Hat in a soft double knit.
Weekend bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip and two handles at the top, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 13x35x42 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short imitation leather shorts with a high waist, zip fly with a button and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, front pockets and no buttons.
Top in sturdy jersey with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves, flared cuffs with a pleat, and a straight-cut hem.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an elastic drawstring at the top of the shaft and reflective details. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. The boots have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Short shirt dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a pleat, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Trousers in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. High, elasticated waist with a drawstring, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in a stretch weave. Lace trims around the neckline and sleeves and down the front.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.
Jacquard-weave top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a fake fly. Tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.

Long-sleeved bodysuit in cotton jersey with a sewn-on waistcoat and bow tie at the front. Bodysuit with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front and a chest pocket.

Straight-style, calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
